title: This is a load of bologna
body: So I just played a game of league and I couldn't load in for the first 5 minutes of the game and they ended up remaking so I tried queueing up with my buddy and got put in 5, 20 minute priority queues. This is actually really frustrating because they remake? So why would it matter it doesn't effect anyones ELO or anything like that and it put me in a freaking 20 minute queue for 5 games. Is there any way to get out of this or do I have to waste 100 minutes of my time to get out of this bull crap.

replies.body:
If they had to remake due to you not being connected in time, that would be the main reason for the LPQ. The other players in the match were still affected by your afk, regardless of whether their ELO was changed or not. Also, you shouldn't have been hit with a 20 min LPQ timer for only one left match.

We should definitely try to address why you couldn't get connected to that match in the first place. There might have been something blocking your network from our servers, so let's check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick before hopping back into more games.

The reason I couldn't connect is because I was stuck in a black loading screen for like a minute I thought it was just loading in but it took awhile so I tried to close it and nothing happened I proceeded to open task manager and force close the game and logged in and had the game remade. I'm just still mad that I got put in a 20 minute queue. If it was 5 minutes I wouldn't mind it that much, but 20 minutes holy crap.
